title: Unit tests: Could not initialize class leakcanary.AppWatcher

### Steps to Reproduce

I have this dependency in my build.gradle (it's a library, so I think I need to use implementation and not debugImplementation)

```implementation "com.squareup.leakcanary:leakcanary-object-watcher-android:2.0"```

I've tried to use `testImplementation libraries.leakCanaryWatcher` without success

**Expected behavior:** [What you expect to happen]

Unit tests pass

I guess it fails when creating the `InternalAppWatcher` singleton instance

```kotlin
private val mainHandler = Handler(Looper.getMainLooper())
```

Would this work?

```kotlin
private val mainHandler by lazy {
    Handler(Looper.getMainLooper())
}
```

`isInstalled` will then be able to check that `::application.isInitialized` is false
